title: How to Buy a Cheap Used Tractor

tasks.task: Evaluate a used tractor and its components for purchase.
subtasks: Check engine oil condition.
Inspect tires for wear and damage.
Assess steering play.
Consider hydraulic system integrity and functionality.
Evaluate power takeoff (PTO) system.
Confirm compatibility between tractor and agricultural implements.
Assess overall condition and suitability for intended use.

tasks.task: Consider factors affecting tractor purchase for small farm operations.
subtasks: Determine appropriate horsepower for land size.
Weigh costs against benefits of used versus new tractors.
Evaluate resale value and potential future investment.
Assess compatibility of tractor features with local farming practices.
